title: What’s the least viewed video on YouTube? - Quora

response.answer_text: Every single minute, 300 hours of video are uploaded to YouTube. 5 billion videos are watched every day. There is no doubt that there are videos tied for 0 views. Every time a video is uploaded, it has 0 views. There is no one least viewed video. If you’d like to see a cool website, check out Petit Tube. Petit Tube loads up videos with very few views. I think the videos it loads all have less than 100 views. It’s really cool to see all the random videos on the internet and know that nearly nobody has seen it (in comparison to the number of internet users). I recommended you check it out!

the least viewed video will be the one with absolutely no tags and no description and the video below is a great example of this. i'm in the process of bringing back my channel that i started in 2007 and this is one of the videos i have not got around to optimizing for search and it truly makes a enormous difference. it makes perfect sence think about it. how can anyone ever see the video if it don't come up in the search they never even know it exists
